aiHints.identificationPrompt: Identify this vinyl record. Extract: artist, album, label, catalog number, pressing info.
aiHints.gradingRules: Use Goldmine grading: Mint (M), Near Mint (NM), Very Good Plus (VG+), Very Good (VG), Good (G), Poor (P). Assess record and sleeve separately.
aiHints.valuationRules: Consider: pressing rarity, condition, artist popularity, original vs reissue, market demand.
